Package org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcontroller.external.samples

Class ConceptI2cAddressChange

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.OpMode
      • com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
        • org.firstinspires.ftc.robotcontroller.external.samples.ConceptI2cAddressChange
  • @TeleOp(name="Concept: I2c Address Change",
        group="Concept")
@Disabled
public class ConceptI2cAddressChange
extends com.qualcomm.robotcore.eventloop.opmode.LinearOpMode
    An example of a linear op mode that shows how to change the I2C address.
